snippet: Interventionist art, among other aesthetic styles, is displayed in an exhibition at NOoSphere Gallery.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews works by Morten Traavik and Peter Fend at NOoSphere Gallery.
lead_paragraph: Interventionist art, among other aesthetic styles, is displayed in an exhibition at NOoSphere Gallery.

headline.seo: MORTEN TRAAVIK AND PETER FEND: ‘Power Games’
